title: Pharrell Williams - Happy (Official Music Video)
description: Get Pharrell's new album G I R L with 10 Brand New Tracks iTunes: http://smarturl.it/GIRLitunes Amazon: http://smarturl.it/GIRLamazonMP3 From the Despicable Me 2 soundtrack. Check out http://24hoursofhappy.com to experience the world's first 24 hour music video! Directed by We Are From L.A.
